function Swap(search, change)
local aob = AOBScan(search)
if aob then
  for i=0,aob.Count-1 do
    autoAssemble(aob[i]..':\ndb '..change)
  end
  aob.Destroy()
end
end

function Orientation(sender)
Swap('31 00 61 00 63 00 31 00 35 00 31 00 37 00 37 00 38 00 33 00 30 00 62 00 37 00 37 00 63 00 34 00 32 00 39 00 33 00 38 00 66 00 66 00 34 00 65 00 62 00 36 00 64 00 64 00 62 00 62 00 32 00 34 00','61 00 34 00 62 00 36 00 37 00 35 00 63 00 34 00 32 00 64 00 61 00 64 00 63 00 39 00 38 00 34 00 61 00 38 00 38 00 31 00 65 00 35 00 61 00 61 00 65 00 35 00 61 00 66 00 38 00 35 00 63 00 37 00')
end

function CustomizationUI(sender)
Swap('32 00 33 00 62 00 37 00 32 00 65 00 37 00 39 00 32 00 39 00 31 00 34 00 62 00 65 00 61 00 34 00 62 00 39 00 35 00 35 00 65 00 30 00 66 00 35 00 62 00 35 00 61 00 61 00 30 00 65 00 33 00 37 00','61 00 39 00 37 00 39 00 38 00 63 00 61 00 64 00 66 00 31 00 30 00 32 00 33 00 65 00 66 00 34 00 63 00 61 00 31 00 36 00 39 00 33 00 64 00 34 00 33 00 63 00 66 00 65 00 62 00 39 00 39 00 39 00')
end

function GoldenSaija(sender)
Swap('31 00 30 00 32 00 63 00 36 00 32 00 35 00 62 00 2D 00 62 00 39 00 38 00 38 00 2D 00 34 00 62 00 66 00 38 00 2D 00 61 00 32 00 61 00 61 00 2D 00 61 00 33 00 31 00 61 00 64 00 37 00 30 00 32 00 39 00 63 00 64 00 63','32 00 37 00 34 00 63 00 62 00 39 00 62 00 32 00 2D 00 32 00 66 00 35 00 39 00 2D 00 34 00 37 00 65 00 61 00 2D 00 39 00 61 00 38 00 64 00 2D 00 61 00 35 00 62 00 36 00 35 00 36 00 64 00 31 00 34 00 38 00 63 00 36')
Swap('44 00 7A 00 67 00 4E 00 36 00 37 00 48 00 6F 00 69 00 6B 00 65 00 78 00 45 00 32 00 72 00 54 00 6C 00 5A 00 4C 00 64 00 59 00 51 00 2C 00 76 00 6D 00 31 00 45 00 53 00 4B 00 39 00 6C 00 73 00 30 00 53 00 61 00 78 00 53 00 77 00 48 00 70 00 6C 00 4E 00 41 00 4C 00 51','45 00 6D 00 5F 00 5F 00 47 00 65 00 59 00 57 00 61 00 55 00 32 00 70 00 41 00 45 00 71 00 57 00 59 00 43 00 42 00 4B 00 70 00 41 00 2C 00 44 00 47 00 38 00 33 00 72 00 75 00 49 00 64 00 49 00 30 00 57 00 75 00 2D 00 47 00 53 00 52 00 67 00 34 00 69 00 63 00 59 00 51')

Swap('35 00 36 00 38 00 37 00 61 00 33 00 39 00 65 00 2D 00 65 00 35 00 64 00 37 00 2D 00 34 00 30 00 65 00 34 00 2D 00 39 00 62 00 33 00 32 00 2D 00 31 00 39 00 30 00 37 00 35 00 34 00 66 00 63 00 36 00 32 00 39 00 32','32 00 63 00 36 00 37 00 39 00 66 00 38 00 39 00 2D 00 63 00 37 00 36 00 65 00 2D 00 34 00 63 00 66 00 62 00 2D 00 39 00 34 00 65 00 39 00 2D 00 34 00 34 00 38 00 63 00 38 00 66 00 64 00 34 00 34 00 64 00 35 00 35 00')
Swap('6B 00 6D 00 39 00 34 00 69 00 33 00 6C 00 48 00 4A 00 55 00 57 00 66 00 6A 00 4B 00 67 00 48 00 72 00 56 00 2D 00 6D 00 48 00 51','34 00 6C 00 77 00 46 00 30 00 30 00 52 00 76 00 62 00 30 00 4B 00 72 00 33 00 46 00 4A 00 7A 00 30 00 37 00 48 00 6C 00 4F 00 51')

Swap('61 00 34 00 34 00 37 00 36 00 36 00 64 00 63 00 2D 00 31 00 39 00 61 00 64 00 2D 00 34 00 34 00 37 00 36 00 2D 00 38 00 34 00 39 00 63 00 2D 00 35 00 31 00 31 00 33 00 61 00 35 00 66 00 61 00 61 00 62 00 64 00 30','35 00 30 00 63 00 39 00 63 00 36 00 66 00 38 00 2D 00 32 00 39 00 36 00 33 00 2D 00 34 00 65 00 66 00 33 00 2D 00 39 00 35 00 64 00 35 00 2D 00 65 00 39 00 39 00 39 00 61 00 38 00 39 00 38 00 32 00 36 00 39 00 66 00')
Swap('6D 00 71 00 64 00 6E 00 63 00 62 00 59 00 63 00 75 00 55 00 53 00 47 00 46 00 76 00 46 00 71 00 45 00 55 00 30 00 7A 00 34 00 41 00 2C 00 48 00 54 00 55 00 33 00 57 00 70 00 5F 00 72 00 69 00 30 00 47 00 4E 00 59 00 47 00 46 00 53 00 65 00 7A 00 46 00 48 00 53 00 67','70 00 45 00 69 00 55 00 36 00 79 00 5A 00 6D 00 32 00 55 00 2D 00 58 00 39 00 69 00 70 00 5F 00 43 00 4D 00 31 00 53 00 41 00 77 00 2C 00 50 00 49 00 56 00 36 00 52 00 74 00 44 00 37 00 50 00 6B 00 2D 00 55 00 54 00 63 00 55 00 70 00 32 00 77 00 46 00 31 00 77 00 77')
end

function RevertGoldenSaija(sender)
Swap('45 00 6D 00 5F 00 5F 00 47 00 65 00 59 00 57 00 61 00 55 00 32 00 70 00 41 00 45 00 71 00 57 00 59 00 43 00 42 00 4B 00 70 00 41 00 2C 00 44 00 47 00 38 00 33 00 72 00 75 00 49 00 64 00 49 00 30 00 57 00 75 00 2D 00 47 00 53 00 52 00 67 00 34 00 69 00 63 00 59 00 51','44 00 7A 00 67 00 4E 00 36 00 37 00 48 00 6F 00 69 00 6B 00 65 00 78 00 45 00 32 00 72 00 54 00 6C 00 5A 00 4C 00 64 00 59 00 51 00 2C 00 76 00 6D 00 31 00 45 00 53 00 4B 00 39 00 6C 00 73 00 30 00 53 00 61 00 78 00 53 00 77 00 48 00 70 00 6C 00 4E 00 41 00 4C 00 51')
Swap('32 00 37 00 34 00 63 00 62 00 39 00 62 00 32 00 2D 00 32 00 66 00 35 00 39 00 2D 00 34 00 37 00 65 00 61 00 2D 00 39 00 61 00 38 00 64 00 2D 00 61 00 35 00 62 00 36 00 35 00 36 00 64 00 31 00 34 00 38 00 63 00 36','31 00 30 00 32 00 63 00 36 00 32 00 35 00 62 00 2D 00 62 00 39 00 38 00 38 00 2D 00 34 00 62 00 66 00 38 00 2D 00 61 00 32 00 61 00 61 00 2D 00 61 00 33 00 31 00 61 00 64 00 37 00 30 00 32 00 39 00 63 00 64 00 63')

Swap('35 00 36 00 38 00 37 00 61 00 33 00 39 00 65 00 2D 00 65 00 35 00 64 00 37 00 2D 00 34 00 30 00 65 00 34 00 2D 00 39 00 62 00 33 00 32 00 2D 00 31 00 39 00 30 00 37 00 35 00 34 00 66 00 63 00 36 00 32 00 39 00 32','64 00 38 00 34 00 39 00 39 00 33 00 64 00 64 00 2D 00 34 00 65 00 31 00 35 00 2D 00 34 00 34 00 38 00 31 00 2D 00 39 00 34 00 35 00 30 00 2D 00 66 00 38 00 38 00 61 00 33 00 34 00 63 00 64 00 62 00 63 00 38 00 32')
Swap('32 00 63 00 36 00 37 00 39 00 66 00 38 00 39 00 2D 00 63 00 37 00 36 00 65 00 2D 00 34 00 63 00 66 00 62 00 2D 00 39 00 34 00 65 00 39 00 2D 00 34 00 34 00 38 00 63 00 38 00 66 00 64 00 34 00 34 00 64 00 35 00 35 00','35 00 36 00 38 00 37 00 61 00 33 00 39 00 65 00 2D 00 65 00 35 00 64 00 37 00 2D 00 34 00 30 00 65 00 34 00 2D 00 39 00 62 00 33 00 32 00 2D 00 31 00 39 00 30 00 37 00 35 00 34 00 66 00 63 00 36 00 32 00 39 00 32')

Swap('35 00 30 00 63 00 39 00 63 00 36 00 66 00 38 00 2D 00 32 00 39 00 36 00 33 00 2D 00 34 00 65 00 66 00 33 00 2D 00 39 00 35 00 64 00 35 00 2D 00 65 00 39 00 39 00 39 00 61 00 38 00 39 00 38 00 32 00 36 00 39 00 66 00','61 00 34 00 34 00 37 00 36 00 36 00 64 00 63 00 2D 00 31 00 39 00 61 00 64 00 2D 00 34 00 34 00 37 00 36 00 2D 00 38 00 34 00 39 00 63 00 2D 00 35 00 31 00 31 00 33 00 61 00 35 00 66 00 61 00 61 00 62 00 64 00 30')
Swap('70 00 45 00 69 00 55 00 36 00 79 00 5A 00 6D 00 32 00 55 00 2D 00 58 00 39 00 69 00 70 00 5F 00 43 00 4D 00 31 00 53 00 41 00 77 00 2C 00 50 00 49 00 56 00 36 00 52 00 74 00 44 00 37 00 50 00 6B 00 2D 00 55 00 54 00 63 00 55 00 70 00 32 00 77 00 46 00 31 00 77 00 77','6D 00 71 00 64 00 6E 00 63 00 62 00 59 00 63 00 75 00 55 00 53 00 47 00 46 00 76 00 46 00 71 00 45 00 55 00 30 00 7A 00 34 00 41 00 2C 00 48 00 54 00 55 00 33 00 57 00 70 00 5F 00 72 00 69 00 30 00 47 00 4E 00 59 00 47 00 46 00 53 00 65 00 7A 00 46 00 48 00 53 00 67')
end

function SellerSaija(sender)
Swap('64 00 38 00 34 00 39 00 39 00 33 00 64 00 64 00 2D 00 34 00 65 00 31 00 35 00 2D 00 34 00 34 00 38 00 31 00 2D 00 39 00 34 00 35 00 30 00 2D 00 66 00 38 00 38 00 61 00 33 00 34 00 63 00 64 00 62 00 63 00 38 00 32','37 00 61 00 36 00 66 00 65 00 30 00 65 00 36 00 2D 00 66 00 39 00 33 00 30 00 2D 00 34 00 66 00 62 00 38 00 2D 00 39 00 62 00 32 00 66 00 2D 00 34 00 63 00 38 00 35 00 37 00 61 00 32 00 37 00 33 00 64 00 64 00 39')
Swap('58 00 4E 00 71 00 34 00 43 00 6E 00 73 00 34 00 6C 00 45 00 47 00 79 00 64 00 74 00 6B 00 74 00 64 00 73 00 58 00 6C 00 6D 00 51 00 2C 00 30 00 58 00 50 00 64 00 35 00 52 00 7A 00 4E 00 4A 00 45 00 65 00 70 00 48 00 7A 00 74 00 71 00 77 00 41 00 7A 00 6E 00 48 00 51','71 00 73 00 70 00 4E 00 69 00 66 00 69 00 39 00 32 00 6B 00 65 00 49 00 2D 00 58 00 73 00 73 00 50 00 42 00 35 00 71 00 44 00 41 00 2C 00 52 00 56 00 72 00 61 00 4A 00 4F 00 50 00 73 00 4F 00 55 00 71 00 5A 00 6A 00 64 00 38 00 62 00 45 00 69 00 50 00 64 00 75 00 51')

Swap('33 00 64 00 39 00 64 00 35 00 32 00 63 00 62 00 2D 00 36 00 61 00 33 00 64 00 2D 00 34 00 33 00 36 00 62 00 2D 00 39 00 30 00 65 00 37 00 2D 00 65 00 37 00 36 00 66 00 32 00 33 00 38 00 33 00 32 00 39 00 65 00 65','32 00 63 00 36 00 37 00 39 00 66 00 38 00 39 00 2D 00 63 00 37 00 36 00 65 00 2D 00 34 00 63 00 66 00 62 00 2D 00 39 00 34 00 65 00 39 00 2D 00 34 00 34 00 38 00 63 00 38 00 66 00 64 00 34 00 34 00 64 00 35 00 35 00')
Swap('66 00 66 00 48 00 4B 00 72 00 35 00 45 00 63 00 49 00 55 00 32 00 34 00 50 00 62 00 41 00 74 00 57 00 53 00 6E 00 61 00 6C 00 77 00 2C 00 62 00 56 00 72 00 6B 00 49 00 79 00 41 00 44 00 43 00 55 00 69 00 47 00 4E 00 59 00 57 00 64 00 6D 00 50 00 5F 00 48 00 50 00 77','39 00 52 00 50 00 62 00 68 00 48 00 4A 00 57 00 42 00 6B 00 71 00 77 00 70 00 44 00 62 00 4D 00 67 00 2D 00 51 00 75 00 6D 00 41 00 2C 00 51 00 7A 00 6B 00 6C 00 6E 00 72 00 76 00 77 00 30 00 45 00 4F 00 69 00 5A 00 31 00 6D 00 72 00 6A 00 5F 00 6E 00 41 00 59 00 77')
end

function FashionSaija(sender)
Swap('64 00 38 00 34 00 39 00 39 00 33 00 64 00 64 00 2D 00 34 00 65 00 31 00 35 00 2D 00 34 00 34 00 38 00 31 00 2D 00 39 00 34 00 35 00 30 00 2D 00 66 00 38 00 38 00 61 00 33 00 34 00 63 00 64 00 62 00 63 00 38 00 32','37 00 36 00 33 00 36 00 39 00 61 00 65 00 66 00 2D 00 61 00 65 00 64 00 61 00 2D 00 34 00 36 00 64 00 32 00 2D 00 39 00 39 00 36 00 61 00 2D 00 63 00 64 00 30 00 30 00 35 00 39 00 34 00 64 00 30 00 35 00 34 00 33')
Swap('37 00 36 00 33 00 36 00 39 00 61 00 65 00 66 00 2D 00 61 00 65 00 64 00 61 00 2D 00 34 00 36 00 64 00 32 00 2D 00 39 00 39 00 36 00 61 00 2D 00 63 00 64 00 30 00 30 00 35 00 39 00 34 00 64 00 30 00 35 00 34 00 33','32 00 37 00 34 00 63 00 62 00 39 00 62 00 32 00 2D 00 32 00 66 00 35 00 39 00 2D 00 34 00 37 00 65 00 61 00 2D 00 39 00 61 00 38 00 64 00 2D 00 61 00 35 00 62 00 36 00 35 00 36 00 64 00 31 00 34 00 38 00 63 00 36')

Swap('34 00 33 00 30 00 38 00 64 00 61 00 30 00 34 00 2D 00 61 00 66 00 38 00 34 00 2D 00 34 00 30 00 62 00 62 00 2D 00 38 00 34 00 35 00 61 00 2D 00 37 00 61 00 39 00 65 00 31 00 61 00 32 00 37 00 32 00 36 00 65 00 63','32 00 63 00 36 00 37 00 39 00 66 00 38 00 39 00 2D 00 63 00 37 00 36 00 65 00 2D 00 34 00 63 00 66 00 62 00 2D 00 39 00 34 00 65 00 39 00 2D 00 34 00 34 00 38 00 63 00 38 00 66 00 64 00 34 00 34 00 64 00 35 00 35')
Swap('35 00 33 00 31 00 62 00 34 00 32 00 39 00 37 00 2D 00 62 00 33 00 38 00 62 00 2D 00 34 00 33 00 36 00 32 00 2D 00 39 00 38 00 35 00 34 00 2D 00 34 00 66 00 32 00 31 00 33 00 39 00 65 00 61 00 34 00 33 00 62 00 65 00 2C 00 33 00 33 00 65 00 65 00 33 00 37 00 36 00 61 00 2D 00 35 00 38 00 36 00 65 00 2D 00 34 00 61 00 66 00 66 00 2D 00 61 00 37 00 65 00 34 00 2D 00 34 00 32 00 31 00 33 00 34 00 34 00 35 00 61 00 33 00 65 00 39 00 32','34 00 36 00 39 00 37 00 30 00 39 00 30 00 33 00 2D 00 39 00 37 00 39 00 39 00 2D 00 34 00 64 00 32 00 35 00 2D 00 62 00 39 00 30 00 61 00 2D 00 37 00 31 00 36 00 32 00 63 00 31 00 66 00 35 00 64 00 62 00 65 00 66 00 2C 00 63 00 32 00 30 00 35 00 32 00 64 00 38 00 63 00 2D 00 66 00 62 00 63 00 64 00 2D 00 34 00 34 00 36 00 32 00 2D 00 38 00 66 00 30 00 38 00 2D 00 62 00 63 00 66 00 35 00 62 00 33 00 64 00 66 00 64 00 65 00 32 00 66')

Swap('30 00 38 00 64 00 35 00 36 00 36 00 32 00 37 00 2D 00 34 00 35 00 30 00 30 00 2D 00 34 00 37 00 32 00 34 00 2D 00 38 00 36 00 39 00 32 00 2D 00 61 00 32 00 33 00 63 00 39 00 36 00 64 00 64 00 62 00 33 00 65 00 63','35 00 30 00 63 00 39 00 63 00 36 00 66 00 38 00 2D 00 32 00 39 00 36 00 33 00 2D 00 34 00 65 00 66 00 33 00 2D 00 39 00 35 00 64 00 35 00 2D 00 65 00 39 00 39 00 39 00 61 00 38 00 39 00 38 00 32 00 36 00 39 00 66')
Swap('35 00 33 00 31 00 62 00 34 00 32 00 39 00 37 00 2D 00 62 00 33 00 38 00 62 00 2D 00 34 00 33 00 36 00 32 00 2D 00 39 00 38 00 35 00 34 00 2D 00 34 00 66 00 32 00 31 00 33 00 39 00 65 00 61 00 34 00 33 00 62 00 65 00 2C 00 63 00 32 00 61 00 39 00 63 00 30 00 30 00 37 00 2D 00 32 00 37 00 34 00 38 00 2D 00 34 00 66 00 61 00 32 00 2D 00 61 00 62 00 39 00 62 00 2D 00 30 00 30 00 38 00 31 00 65 00 65 00 66 00 37 00 39 00 32 00 66 00 31','34 00 36 00 39 00 37 00 30 00 39 00 30 00 33 00 2D 00 39 00 37 00 39 00 39 00 2D 00 34 00 64 00 32 00 35 00 2D 00 62 00 39 00 30 00 61 00 2D 00 37 00 31 00 36 00 32 00 63 00 31 00 66 00 35 00 64 00 62 00 65 00 66 00 2C 00 30 00 35 00 63 00 66 00 66 00 38 00 62 00 38 00 2D 00 64 00 34 00 33 00 37 00 2D 00 34 00 38 00 35 00 61 00 2D 00 62 00 34 00 62 00 38 00 2D 00 34 00 31 00 64 00 33 00 35 00 62 00 65 00 63 00 64 00 30 00 32 00 32')
end

UraniumMain1 = createForm(true)
UraniumMain1.Caption = ""
UraniumMain1.Color = 0x181818
UraniumMain1.Height = 430
UraniumMain1.Width = 500
UraniumMain1.Left = 620
UraniumMain1.Top = 300

lblTitle = createLabel(UraniumMain1)
lblTitle.Caption = "Menu"
lblTitle.font.Color = 0xA087FF
lblTitle.Font.Size = 18
lblTitle.Top = 18
lblTitle.Left = 198

linTitle = createLabel(UraniumMain1)
linTitle.caption = "_________________________________________________________________________________________________________________"
linTitle.Font.Color = 0x707070
linTitle.Font.Size = 10
linTitle.Left = 0
linTitle.Top = 46
linTitle.Alignment = taCenter

btnOrientation = createButton(UraniumMain1)
btnOrientation.Caption = "Skip Orientation"
btnOrientation.Font.Size = 10
btnOrientation.Height = 32
btnOrientation.Width = 480
btnOrientation.Left = 10
btnOrientation.Top = 80
btnOrientation.onClick = Orientation

btnCustomize = createButton(UraniumMain1)
btnCustomize.Caption = "Customization UI"
btnCustomize.Font.Size = 10
btnCustomize.Height = 32
btnCustomize.Width = 480
btnCustomize.Left = 10
btnCustomize.Top = 112
btnCustomize.onClick = CustomizationUI

lblGolden = createLabel(UraniumMain1)
lblGolden.Caption = "Golden Textures"
lblGolden.font.Color = 0x707070
lblGolden.Font.Size = 11
lblGolden.Top = 160
lblGolden.Left = 196

btnGoldenSaija = createButton(UraniumMain1)
btnGoldenSaija.Caption = "Golden Saija Set"
btnGoldenSaija.Font.Size = 10
btnGoldenSaija.Height = 32
btnGoldenSaija.Width = 235
btnGoldenSaija.Left = 10
btnGoldenSaija.Top = 185
btnGoldenSaija.onClick = GoldenSaija

btnRevertGoldenSaija = createButton(UraniumMain1)
btnRevertGoldenSaija.Caption = "Revert Saija Set"
btnRevertGoldenSaija.Font.Size = 10
btnRevertGoldenSaija.Height = 32
btnRevertGoldenSaija.Width = 235
btnRevertGoldenSaija.Left = 254
btnRevertGoldenSaija.Top = 185
btnRevertGoldenSaija.onClick = RevertGoldenSaija

btnGoldenSaija = createButton(UraniumMain1)
btnGoldenSaija.Caption = "Seller Saija Set"
btnGoldenSaija.Font.Size = 10
btnGoldenSaija.Height = 32
btnGoldenSaija.Width = 235
btnGoldenSaija.Left = 10
btnGoldenSaija.Top = 270
btnGoldenSaija.onClick = SellerSaija

btnRevertGoldenSaija = createButton(UraniumMain1)
btnRevertGoldenSaija.Caption = "Revert Saija Set"
btnRevertGoldenSaija.Font.Size = 10
btnRevertGoldenSaija.Height = 32
btnRevertGoldenSaija.Width = 235
btnRevertGoldenSaija.Left = 254
btnRevertGoldenSaija.Top = 270
btnRevertGoldenSaija.onClick = RevertSellerSaija

btnGoldenSaija = createButton(UraniumMain1)
btnGoldenSaija.Caption = "Fashion Saija Set"
btnGoldenSaija.Font.Size = 10
btnGoldenSaija.Height = 32
btnGoldenSaija.Width = 235
btnGoldenSaija.Left = 10
btnGoldenSaija.Top = 354
btnGoldenSaija.onClick = FashionSaija

btnRevertGoldenSaija = createButton(UraniumMain1)
btnRevertGoldenSaija.Caption = "Revert Saija Set"
btnRevertGoldenSaija.Font.Size = 10
btnRevertGoldenSaija.Height = 32
btnRevertGoldenSaija.Width = 235
btnRevertGoldenSaija.Left = 254
btnRevertGoldenSaija.Top = 354
btnRevertGoldenSaija.onClick = RevertFashionSaija
